titles.title: Rural Water System Disaster Preparedness and Assistance Act
Rural Water System Disaster Preparedness and Assistance Act

A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to establish an emergency preparedness and response technical assistance program to assist entities that operate rural water or wastewater systems in preparing for and responding to natural or manmade disasters.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
